title: Message to President Po Sun Yun of Korea.
text:
Dear Mr. President:

It is with great pleasure that I extend my congratulations and best wishes to you upon your assumption of the office of President of the Republic of Korea.

I wish you all success in discharging the responsibilities of this high office, your accession to which bears eloquent testimony to the trust and confidence reposed in you as a distinguished leader of a great people. Sincerely,

DWIGHT D. EISENHOWER
